tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: World's Greatest Drag Race 2!
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: It's back! The World's Greatest Drag Race returns with nine of the world's best supercars, sports cars, and muscle cars for 2012 facing off in an epic quarter-mile sprint for glory... and ultimate bragging rights! This year's field includes all nine contenders from Motor Trend's 2012 Best Driver's Car competition. We have the Lamborghini Aventador, Nissan GT-R Black Edition, Ford Shelby GT500, McLaren MP4-12C, Jaguar XKR-S, Porsche 911 Carrera S, Subaru BRZ, Mercedes-Benz C63 AMG Black Series and Chevrolet Camaro ZL1 -- all gathered together on an abandoned airstrip at El Toro Marine Base to find out which car is the fastest. Obviously these nine competitors display a wide range of power and performance, not to mention price tags. So why are we lining them all up again for one gigantic, over-the-top drag race? It's simple... Because We Can! World's Greatest Drag Race 2 concludes our special 2012 Best Driver's Car Week here on the Motor Trend youtube channel (www.youtube.com and on MotorTrend.com (www.motortrend.com). We hope you've enjoyed all of this week's videos and we look forward to rolling out an all-new batch of amazing cars and amazing videos for you next year for Motor Trend's 2013 Best Driver's Car. Read the full story on Motor Trend's 2012 Best Driver's Car here www.motortrend.com Subscribe now to the Motor Trend youtube channel to make sure you're in on all the action! www.youtube.com Facebook - facebook.com Twitter - twitter.com Google+ - plus.google.com ...

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Thumbs﻿ up if it gave you a hard on!
I was waiting for the XKR-S﻿ sound at the end :(
@MattZ those trucks hitting 8's and 9's are not﻿ as configured on the showroom floor. Every car they just raced was configured as sold new, right down to tires and factory tune.
If You Come Down Here To The Rgv In Texas We Have Trucks Hitting High 8's Low 9's So All There's Are Considered﻿ Slow Cause We Have 4 Door Trucks Hitting Those Times
ดูไม่ได้﻿
Wtf? No BMW?﻿

【httｐ://bb99.info/a】皆様にご相談があります...どなたかお金にお困りの方おりませんか？私は自分のお金の使い道に困っております。自分の諸事情なのですが...どなたか5,000,000円受け取って下さる方いらっしゃいませんか？どなたにでもお譲り致します。条件等は一切ございません。いきなりこんな所に書き込んでしまって失礼を承知の上ですが、どなたかに受け取って頂きたく思っております。受け取って頂けるという方は、youtube内の動画検索にて【 お金差し上げます 】で、検索してみて下さい。詳細はそこに記載しております。こちらから【httｐ://bb99.info/a】も、見て頂く事ができます...いきなりこんなの信じられないかもしれませんが、 お困りの方は早急にご連絡の方お待ちしております...﻿
Bugati Veyron would destroy those﻿ cars.
Ford﻿ all day
my question is does body weight﻿ make a difference in the race?

Please ... Next time invite real Porsche / Mercedes. The SL 63 AMG has 150HP more than the C 63 in﻿ this video. And a Porsche Turbo S has also about 130HP more than your tested Carrera S. What is fair about comparing the best american / italian sport cars with just mean german sport cars?
Lol shelby whooped the camaro, that's all I﻿ care bout

I DONT TRUST ANYTHING ON THE NET! THIS IS﻿ BULLSHIT!! PPL YOU REALY THINK YOU CAN MAKE 10K IN ONE MONTH THAT EASY?? LIKE ONE HERE SAID.
THIS PERSON SURE HECKET THE THUMBS UP! DONT FAL ON THIS do not give your personal data on the casino side its 100% FAKE!!
a friend of me did that mistake on similar thing like this one he was geting a bill next monthe with over 5000K €
Bugatti﻿ Veyron?

Two things,﻿ the LFA sucks and it isn't new.
So, thankfully, no LFA.
Wow!﻿
Wheres the LFA?? this race is invalid.﻿
Suburu- lost race- zero fucks given do﻿ burnouts anyway
先日は本当にありがとうございました。正直半信半疑で「５００万円は多すぎるので50万円ください」とご連絡しましたが、本当にお金を頂けると思っていませんでした。今学費に困っていましたので本当に助かりました！！みなさんの批判の声もありますが、世のため人のためを思っている心ある方でしたので応援しています！！！・・・近々またメールしますね。﻿
AND at least that Subaru BRZ has a great acceleration too﻿ at first :D
